name: Morning Shopping
description: Online or quick in-store shopping by early risers.

name: Late Morning Browsing
description: Casual shopping during breaks or commute.

name: Lunchtime Shopping
description: Shopping during lunch breaks, especially online.

name: Afternoon Shopping
description: Leisurely shopping or running errands in the afternoon.

name: After Work Shopping
description: Peak shopping hours after work, including gifts, clothing, or essentials.

name: Late Night Shopping
description: Online shopping before bed, often for electronics or gifts.

name: Overnight Bargain Shopping
description: Late-night bargain hunters shopping online during off-peak hours.
